User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user account in the system.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User, same as their Firebase Auth UID.

role.description: The user's role within their tenant.

status.description: The status of the user account.

tenantId.description: The unique identifier for the tenant the user belongs to.

Asset.title: Asset
Asset.description: Represents a company asset with all its associated details.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Asset entity.

make.description: The make or manufacturer of the asset.

model.description: The model name or number of the asset.

serialNumber.description: The serial number of the asset.

purchaseFrom.description: The vendor from whom the asset was purchased.

processor.description: The processor details of the asset.

ram.description: The RAM details of the asset.

storage.description: The storage details of the asset.

assetType.description: The type of the asset (e.g., Laptop, Monitor).

assignedTo.description: The ID of the employee this asset is assigned to.

status.description: The current status of the asset.

Employee.title: Employee
Employee.description: Represents an employee with their details.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Employee entity.

employeeId.description: The unique ID assigned to the employee.

department.description: The department the employee belongs to.

designation.description: The job title or role of the employee.

joiningDate.description: The date the employee joined the company.

status.description: The current employment status of the employee.

exitDate.description: The date the employee exited the company.

exitReason.description: The reason for the employee's exit.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Vendor entity.

contactPerson.description: Primary contact person at the vendor.

phone.description: Contact phone number of the vendor.

products.description: List of products or services supplied.

Software.title: Software
Software.description: Represents a software license and its details.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Software entity.

version.description: Version or edition of the software.

vendorId.description: ID of the vendor from whom it was purchased.

expiryDate.description: Date the license expires or needs renewal.

ownership.description: Ownership status of the software license.

attachments.description: Names of uploaded attachments like invoices or documents.

assignedTo.description: Array of employee IDs this software is assigned to.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Award entity.

name.description: Name of the award (e.g., Service Excellence Award).

type.description: The frequency or type of the award.

employeeId.description: The ID of the employee receiving the award.

department.description: The department of the awarded employee (denormalized).

awardDate.description: The date the award was given.

awardedBy.description: Name or role of the person/entity giving the award.

reason.description: A description of why the award was given.

certificateTemplate.description: Identifier for the visual template of the certificate.

isLocked.description: Indicates if the award record is locked from editing.

Consumable.title: Consumable
Consumable.description: Represents a consumable item with its stock details.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Consumable item.

name.description: Name of the consumable item (e.g., HDMI Cable).

category.description: Category of the item (e.g., Cable, Peripheral).

vendorId.description: ID of the vendor from whom it was purchased.

costPerItem.description: Optional cost per item for reporting.

IssueLog.title: IssueLog
IssueLog.description: Represents a log entry for a consumable item being issued.

employeeId.description: ID of the employee the item was issued to.

/tenants/{tenantId}/assets/{assetId}.description: Stores all assets for an organization.

/tenants/{tenantId}/employees/{employeeI.description: Stores all employees for an organization.

/tenants/{tenantId}/vendors/{vendorId}.description: Stores all vendors for an organization.

/tenants/{tenantId}/software/{softwareId.description: Stores all software licenses for an organization.

/tenants/{tenantId}/awards/{awardId}.description: Stores all employee awards for an organization.

/tenants/{tenantId}/consumables/{consuma.description: Stores all consumable items for an organization.

/tenants/{tenantId}/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profiles for an organization's tenant.
